name: Colour Run (SamaBanana)
description:
Colour Run!

Made by:  Samantha Fallahi 216435521

Controls: 

-Space to jump

-Double click space to double jump

-R to restart

-M to go back to the menu

Collect coins to earn points!

Collecting coloured orbs powers up your power bar. Collect all different coloured orbs to power up. Any enemies you come into contact with in the next 10 seconds gets destroyed, and you earn 10 points.

Get hit by the enemies when you're not powered up, and you'll lose a life. Lose all three and it's game over!
